onboard_body_1: You can easily add your crops to our system. We will give you crop-based weather alerts.
onboard_body_2: You can reach weather data from all around the world.
onboard_body_3: We are 7/24 searching weather datas from all around the world for your crops.
onboard_body_4: If you have questions about your crops. You can ask your questions to agriculture experts
